title: As a user I want the latest reinstatement date calculated correctly on the Inactive List widget
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://r6vcv1.axshare.com/#p=players_on_inactive_list

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Players+on+Inactive+List+widget

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The Latest Reinstatement Date is blank for all placement types except for Bereavement List and Paternity List.
* The Latest Reinstatement Date for these two placement types matches the one displayed on the actual transaction.

title: Inactive List widget - Permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* A new permission is created for the Inactive List widget. 
* Users with this permission see the DL/IL/Rehab tab under the Transactions dashboard. 
* Users with this permission see the Players on Inactive List widget on the tab.
* Users without this permission do not see the Players on Inactive List widget.

title: As a BOC user I want to view the Inactive List widget
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://r6vcv1.axshare.com/#p=players_on_inactive_list

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Players+on+Inactive+List+widget

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The Disabled List/Rehab tab under Transactions is renamed "DL/IL/Rehab"
* Change browser tab text to "DL/IL/Rehab"
* On the tab there is a "Players on Inactive List" widget beneath the DL and Rehab widgets.
* The widget matches the provided data discovery and wireframe. 
* The population of the widget should be every player in the system that is currently on the Inactive List EXCEPT for those on the Deceased List (Note that this should include Restricted/Assigned and Suspended/Assigned players).
* By default the widget should only show players that have been placed on the Inactive List in the past calendar year (using transaction date). 
* Users should be able to view players placed on the IL prior to a year ago using a filter under the filter icon.
* BOC Users should be able to filter the widget down by Org using a filter under the filter icon. 
* The "Type" filter and "Level" filters are available and work. 
* Default widget export and filters work.
*The earliest and latest reinstatement date columns as well as the games played column are covered in subsequent stories*

title: As a Club user I want to view the Inactive List widget
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://r6vcv1.axshare.com/#p=players_on_inactive_list

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Players+on+Inactive+List+widget

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The Disabled List/Rehab tab under Transactions is renamed "DL/IL/Rehab"
* On the tab there is a "Players on Inactive List" widget beneath the DL and Rehab widgets.
* The widget matches the provided data discovery and wireframe. 
* The population of the widget should be every player on the viewing user's Org that is currently on the Inactive List EXCEPT for those on the Deceased List (Note that this should include Restricted/Assigned and Suspended/Assigned players).
* By default the widget should only show players that have been placed on the Inactive List in the past calendar year (using transaction date). 
* Users should be able to view players placed on the IL prior to a year ago using a filter under the filter icon.
* Club Users should not be able to view other Club's IL players in this widget.
* The "Type" filter and "Level" filters are available and work. 
* Default widget export and filters work.
*The earliest and latest reinstatement date columns as well as the games played column are covered in subsequent stories*

title: As a user I want the earliest reinstatement date calculated correctly on the Inactive List widget
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://r6vcv1.axshare.com/#p=players_on_inactive_list

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Players+on+Inactive+List+widget

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The Earliest Reinstatement Date is properly calculated and displayed for each player that appears on the IL widget per the provided data discovery. 
* For those placement types that rely on system dates or schedule information being available, the entire widget does not error out if a date or information is missing. The individual reinstatement date can display NULL or blank or an error code or something, but the other rows and the remainder of the widget should not be affected. 
* Dates that are calculated using schedule information should appear in italics. 
*Note that some MJ and MN reinstatement dates are calculated differently for the same placement type*

title: As a user I want the system to calculate the Games Played on the Inactive List correctly
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://r6vcv1.axshare.com/#p=players_on_inactive_list

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Players+on+Inactive+List+widget

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The Games Played column should be populated with the number of games that the player's Club has been scheduled to play since the transaction date.
* The games played should include any games that occurred on the actual placement date, as well as any games scheduled for the current date.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to indicate that an Inactive List placement should void a player's Addendum C
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* On a MN Place on Restricted List placement there is a checkbox where the BOC can indicate that the player's Addendum C should be voided. Club users are not able to edit this field.
* If the MN Place on Restricted List placement Reason is set to 'Leave without permission' or 'Failure to report within 10 days of season opening' or 'Failure to submit Voluntarily Retired Letter' then the checkbox should be checked by default. 
* If the checkbox is checked at the time of approval then the player's Addendum C should be voided for the year AND the player's MN Contract Year should be invalidated. (the year is defined as R5 date to R5 date)
* On a MN Place on Suspended List placement there is a checkbox where the BOC can indicate that the player's Addendum C should be voided. Club users are not able to edit this field.
* If the MN Place on Suspended List placement Reason is set to 'Leave Without Permission' then the checkbox should be checked by default. 
* Reversing the transaction should undo the invalidation and Add C void. 
* The comments associated with the year in the MN Contract/Service Year widget should populate with "Placement Type - Reason - mm/dd/yyyy" Ex: "Restricted List - Leave Without Permission - 10/23/2018". If comments already existed, append these.
* Part of this story should be to retroactively populate this checkbox on existing MN Place on Restricted List and MN Place on Suspended Lists with the above reasons. 
* Do a comparison of any guys who have this set and did NOT have his C voided and Contract Year and attach here for review.

title: As a Club user I want to view the Transaction Payments screen
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=trade_waiver_claim_payments_-_club

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Transaction+Payments

Acceptance Criteria: 
* As a Club user, there is a new "Transaction Payments" tab under the Transactions dashboard.
* Clicking on Transaction Payments will load the screen per the wireframe and the data discovery. 
* The utility contains only those transactions that should be displayed for the viewing Org on the Outgoing and Incoming pages.
* The Club user is unable to view other Org's transactions in this utility, unless they are either receiving or giving a payment.

title: As a BOC user I want to view the Transaction Payments screen
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=trade_waiver_claim_payments_-_boc

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Transaction+Payments

Acceptance Criteria: 
* As a BOC user, there is a new "Transaction Payments" tab under the Transactions dashboard.
* Browser tab text = "Transaction Payments"
* Clicking on Transaction Payments will load the screen per the wireframe and the data discovery. 
*This story is to deliver the new tab and the bones of the screen, the population and details of the screen itself will be covered in the population story*

title: Transaction Payments - Permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:
* A new permission is created to control access to the Transaction Payments utility.
* Users with the permission see the "Transactions" menu on the left nav and the "Transaction Payments" tab under the Transactions dashboard. They are also able to load and view the utility. 
* Users without the permission do not see the Transaction Payments tab or the utility.

title: As a user I want to see payment information on a Rule 5 Selection
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://aceshn.axshare.com/#p=rule_5_selection

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Rule+5+Selection+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria:
* For all newly created Rule 5 Selection transactions there are two new fields available and visible on the form. 
  - Payment Due Date
  - Paid Date
* Payment Due is equal to the selection date and uneditable. 
* Paid Date is an editable date field and is editable post approval by the BOC and the involved Club. 
* These fields do not display on previous Rule 5 Selections.

title: As a user I want to see payment information on a Return of Rule 5 Selection
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=club_accepts_-_return_of_rule_5_selection_submitte

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Return+of+Rule+5+Selection

Acceptance Criteria:
* For all newly created Return of Rule 5 Selection transactions for ACCEPTED Rule 6 Returns, there are two new fields available and visible on the form. 
  - Payment Due Date
  - Paid Date
* Payment Due is equal to the selection date and uneditable. 
* Paid Date is an editable date field and is editable post approval by the BOC and the involved Clubs. 
* These fields do not display on previous Return of Rule 5 Selections, or new Return of Rule 5 Selections for REJECTED Rule 6 Returns.
* "Assignment Agreement" should also be an available label for the transaction, and a file attachment label should be required if a file is attached.

title: As a user I want to export the Payment Transactions screen
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* Users see an "Export" button when viewing the Transaction Payments utility. 
* Clicking Export will download an xls of the data currently displayed on the screen (including any applied filters).

title: As a user I want the Transaction Payments screen to have the correct population of transactions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* A transaction appears in the Transaction Payment screen if the transaction is an Outright Trade, Waiver Claim Assignment, Rule 5 Selection or Return of Rule 5 Selection AND any of the following are true: 
 - The transaction has at least one Payment Due that has not yet been marked paid.
 - The transaction has an Assignment Agreement required that has not yet been uploaded.
 - The transaction has at least one PTBNL that has not yet been named OR paid.
 - The transaction has at least one PTBNL Assignment Agreement that has not yet been uploaded.
* The transaction should appear in the appropriate Org(s) section of the utility. (Note that the same transaction might appear in multiple places to cover all outgoing and incoming payments and PTBNL due)
* The Payments due dates and amounts listed should match those on the transaction itself, including any included Payment schedules.
* The payments due should appear in the appropriate colors. 
* The transaction appropriately rolls off when None of the above criteria are met for the transaction anymore.

*Note that ALL historical Rule 5 Selections and Return of Rule 5 Selections need to be omitted from this utility, despite the fact that some of them might not have Assignment Agreements and none will have paid dates*

title: As a user I want to receive a notification when a Payment is due if not marked paid
custom_steps:
Clipboard:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/MJA+Notifications

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a payment on an Outright Trade or Waiver Claim Assignment is due that has not yet been marked paid, generate Notification #11 for Club and BOC MJ Transaction Admins. E
* A notification should only be generated for an outstanding payment one time.

title: As a user I do not want to see extremely old transactions on the Transaction Payments screen
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The data for older trades is causing more to appear in the Transaction Payments utility than really should. We need to either adjust the data so that they don't appear anymore by changing the file attachment label to Assignment Agreement or add a time constraint to these transactions. 
* Any of the ones done in ebis1 should be removed from this utility. (Date of around 1/31/2017 or earlier)

title: As a user I want to see different LOP columns on the PIEF List that are determined by their stats and not which LOP they ended the season on
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=pief_list_-_club

*Need to double check this logic against ebis1*

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When viewing the PIEF List, there is a Level of Play column. Currently, that is displaying the level of play that the player is on at the time he is added to the PIEF List. 
* We need to remove this Level of Play column, and replace it with 4 new columns. 
* The system should display a YYYY LOP by G column with YYYY replaced with the current year.
* The system should display a YYYY LOP by IP column with YYYY replaced with the current year. 
* The system should display a YYYY LOP by G column with YYYY replaced with the prior calendar year.
* The system should display a YYYY LOP by IP column with YYYY replaced with the prior calendar year. 
* Each of these columns should be populated for pitchers only.
* All of these columns should lock in at the time the PIEF List is marked Reviewed. 

*The logic to calculate the LOP for these columns should match that of ebis1. *
* Example explanation: 
Level of play is the level at which a player accrued at least 50% of total stats counting down from the MLB (MJ) level.

Player A

MLB: 20 Innings Pitched
AAA: 15 Innings Pitched
AA: 25 Innings Pitched
 
In the example above, Player A is a AAA player.  He pitched 60 total innings, and counting down from the top, at MLB he pitched 20/60 or 33%, that doesnâ€™t total at least 50%, so we go to next level.  Counting MLB and AAA he pitched 35/60 or 58%.  Even though he pitched most of his innings at AA, he reached the 50% threshold at AAA so thatâ€™s his level.

title: As a user I want the PIEF List's stat comparison to use the calculated Level of Play to determine if they have met the threshold for the PIEF List rather than the LOP they ended the season at
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The flag that appears on the PIEF List indicating that a player does not meet the criteria for Extreme Fatigue is currently based on the player's actual level of play, rather than the calculated value. Note that this is ALSO true for those checks where the player's stats are compared to the prior year. 
* The flag needs to be updated to use the player's calculated LOP based on the stats earned. The remainder of the logic should work the same as outlined in the original story https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/153201633

title: As a user I want to see the MN Contract/Service Years widget on Professional Player Profiles
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=service

Acceptance Criteria: 
* On the Service tab of professional player profiles there is a "MN Contract/Service Years" at the bottom. 
* The widget matches the provided wireframe. 
*Population and editing is covered in other stories*

title: As a user I want the MN Contract Years batch to determine which years each player earned a Contract Year for
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The MN Contract Years batch is updated to have a "from beginning of time" mode that will allow us to determine the specific years that each player has earned a MN Contract Year during their career. 
* This batch will populate the MN Contract/Service Years widget for each player. 
* A year is added to the widget for each year that the player appeared on either a MJ or MN Roster at any point during the year (need to take into account the 2+ year on an IL requirement that hides these players from rosters). 
* If the player earned a contract year for the year, a checkmark displays. If the player did not earn a contract year for the year, no checkmark displays.

*Note that the Contract Years field on the Service tab should NOT be updated yet so that we can compare the historical value to the total calculated by the new batch and adjust any individual players accordingly.*

title: As a BOC user I want to edit the MN Contract/Service Years widget on Professional Player Profiles
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=service

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a BOC user with professional player edit permissions is viewing the widget, there are pencil icons available for each row. (Check to see if we have any special permissions around editing the Service widgets - if we do we should re-use the same permission set here, if not we can use the standard pro player editor) 
* Clicking the pencil icon will place the selected row into edit mode.
* The user should have the ability to edit the MN Contract Years column for each year to designate whether the player earned the year, did not earn it, or should have the year invalidated. 
* Comments should be required for any year that they invalidate.  
* Options in the dropdown should be "Earned" "Not Earned" and "Invalidated"

title: As a user I want the MN Service Years batch to determine which years each player earned a Service Year form
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The MN Service Years batch is updated to have a "from beginning of time" mode that will allow us to determine the specific years that each player has earned a MN Service Year during their career. 
* This batch will populate the MN Contract/Service Years widget for each player. 
* If the player earned a DSL/VSL MN Service year for the year, a checkmark displays in that column. If the player did not earn a service year for the year, no checkmark displays. 
* If the player earned a non-DSL/VSL MN Service year for the year, a checkmark displays in that column. If the player did not earn a service year for the year, no checkmark displays.

title: As a user I want the MN Contract Years batch to determine when a player has earned a MN Contract Year for the current year
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The MN Contract Years batch is updated to check each player that is on a MJ or MN Roster each night to determine if they should have a contract year for the current year.
* If the player appears on a roster and they do not yet have the current year in the MN Contract/Service Years widget, add it. 
* They should earn a year if they appeared on a MN Roster with an Active or DL roster status during the season, regardless of if they have a MN Contract for the year or an Addendum C. 
* The MN Contract Year batch should ignore any players for which the Contract Year has already been invalidated (either manually or via IL placement).

title: As a user I want to indicate in the system which historical years a player's MN Contract Year was invalidated
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* After #161005202 has been delivered and the batch run, a script needs to be constructed and run to mark the historical years that were "invalidated".
* To be considered invalidated, the system must find a specific Inactive List transaction for the year. (See Below)
* Regardless of if the player would have earned a contract year or not, if one of the below IL placements is found for a year, display a red X for the year. 
* The cutoff date for a year is the Rule 5 Draft. 

Inactive List transactions: 
* Minor League Restricted List with reasons of : 
  1. Leave without permission 
  2. Failure to report within 10 days of season opening
  3. Failure to submit Voluntarily Retired Letter 
* Minor League Suspended List transaction with reasons of: 
  1. Leave without permission
* Place on Voluntarily Retired list

title: As a BOC user I want voiding a player's MN Contract to uncheck the player's MN Contract Year if it's the only one
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* Voiding a player's MN contract should re-run the MN Contract Years batch "from the beginning of time" batch on the player to determine if any of the players MN Contract Years need to be removed.
* If the player should have any of their MN Contract years removed as a result of the void, it is appropriately reflected in the player's MN Contract/Service Years widget.

title: As a user I want the Potential Minor League Free Agent Year batch to look at the number of MN Contract Years a player has earned instead of the number of Addendum Cs
custom_steps:
Batch Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Potential+MnFA+Year+Batch

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The Potential Minor League Free Agent Year batch should be updated so that instead of checking the number of C's a player has had associated with their current MN Contract, it is looking at the number of Contract Years that have been earned while on their current contract. 
* All of the batch rules as laid out still work, including the setting of the year on the player's Pro Player Profile.
* The batch results after this change is made should be compared to the results using the old batch rules to ensure that we have gotten it right. (They should match or any discrepancies should be known and already accounted for from other stories)
* In addition to the above changes we also need to begin calculating this year for players who are in the last year of their MJ Contract, regardless of if they have a MN Contract or not. (rules updated)

title: As a user I want to be able to review any discrepancies between the new total values and the prior Contract Year calculated value
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* Once #161005202 has been completed and all of the players' have their "new" MN Contract Year totals, a script needs to be run that compares the total "MN Contract Years" value on the profile to the sum of the individual MN Contract Years identified by the new version of the batch.
* For those players that these numbers do not match, produce a document for dev and user review that contains Player ID, Last, First, New Contract Year Total, Old Contract Year Total, current Roster Status, Org.  
* Review the list, particularly any obvious outliers and make sure no glaring errors in the batch have been revealed. 
* Turn the list over to product to review with users and see if any individual data fixes need to be made. 

* We also need to compare the current MN Contract Years to the player's Addendum C's and examine any discrepancies.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to indicate that an Inactive List placement should void a player's Addendum C
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* On a MN Place on Restricted List placement there is a checkbox where the BOC can indicate that the player's Addendum C should be voided. Club users are not able to edit this field.
* If the MN Place on Restricted List placement Reason is set to 'Leave without permission' or 'Failure to report within 10 days of season opening' or 'Failure to submit Voluntarily Retired Letter' then the checkbox should be checked by default. 
* If the checkbox is checked at the time of approval then the player's Addendum C should be voided for the year AND the player's MN Contract Year should be invalidated. (the year is defined as R5 date to R5 date)
* On a MN Place on Suspended List placement there is a checkbox where the BOC can indicate that the player's Addendum C should be voided. Club users are not able to edit this field.
* If the MN Place on Suspended List placement Reason is set to 'Leave Without Permission' then the checkbox should be checked by default. 
* Reversing the transaction should undo the invalidation and Add C void. 
* The comments associated with the year in the MN Contract/Service Year widget should populate with "Placement Type - Reason - mm/dd/yyyy" Ex: "Restricted List - Leave Without Permission - 10/23/2018". If comments already existed, append these.
* Part of this story should be to retroactively populate this checkbox on existing MN Place on Restricted List and MN Place on Suspended Lists with the above reasons. 
* Do a comparison of any guys who have this set and did NOT have his C voided and Contract Year and attach here for review.

title: As a user I want the Nightly Minor League Free Agent batch to look at the number of MN Contract Years a player has earned instead of the number of Addendum Cs
custom_steps:
Batch Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Nightly+Potential+Free+Agent+Batch

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The Nightly Potential Minor League Free Agent batch should be updated so that instead of checking the number of C's a player has had associated with their current MN Contract, it is looking at the number of Contract Years that have been earned while on their current contract. 
* All of the batch rules as laid out still work, including the setting of the flag on the player's Pro Player Profile. 
* The batch results after this change is made should be compared to the results using the old batch rules to ensure that we have gotten it right. (They should match or any discrepancies should be known and already accounted for from other stories)

title: As a BOC user I want approving a player's Place on Voluntarily Retired list transaction to invalidate their MN Contract Year
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* Approving a MN place on Voluntarily Retired list transaction then the player's Addendum C should be voided for the year AND the player's MN Contract Year should be invalidated if it has not already been done so. (the year is defined as R5 date to R5 date)
* The comments associated with the year in the MN Contract/Service Year widget should populate with "Voluntarily Retired - mm/dd/yyyy" with the date being replaced with the transaction date. If comments already existed, append these. 
* Reversing the transaction should undo the invalidation, comments and Add C void.

title: As a user I want the MN Contract Years and Service Years values on the player's profile to be the sum of the years displayed in the MN Contract/Service Years widget
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The MN Contract Years value on the player's profile is set to the sum total of the years marked with a checkmark for MN Contract Year in the MN Contract/Service Years widget.
* The MN Service Years value on the player's profile is set to the sum total of the years marked with a checkmark for MN Service Year displayed in the MN Contract/Service Years widget.

title: As a user I want to be able to add a Mexican Assignment Agreement to any MN Contract
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* When creating any minor contract there is the "Add Section" option. 
* "Mexican Assignment Agreement" is an option under the add section button, in addition to whatever other sections were previously available.
* Selecting "Mexican Assignment Agreement" will add the section to the MNC.
* The user will have the ability to complete the Mexican Assignment Agreement portion of the MN Contract. 
* For International First Year contracts, the mexican assignment agreement's fee paid to the player counts as the player's Signing Bonus (in addition to any signing bonus clause added) .
* For Domestic First Year contracts, the fee paid to the player counts as the player's signing bonus (in addition to any signing bonus clause added).
* Non First Year contracts continue to not appear in either utility. 
* Check to see any places that we need to update the Signing Bonus amount to include the player's fee and the signing bonus amount to display the total like we have been doing for International First Year contracts.

title: As BOC, I want to manually adjust Intl Signing Bonus pool total amounts
custom_steps:
Currently in the Intl Signing Bonus Utility, the bonus pools just have the concept of an "original" flag in them.  This drives the max allowable pool amount - both the value on the UI, as well as underlying rule checks on Trades.  BOC Users would like more control/flexibility in what drives this max allowable pool amount.

1 - Update the system value, go from a percentage to a multiplier.  Currently it is 75 for 2018, it should be 1.75 instead.  Same with the years going forward.
2 - Add a new field to the Signing Bonus Pool section -> *Amount Towards Max* 
    - When we create original pool entries at the beginning of the signing period, we will use the system value associated with the given year to calculate Amount Towards Max.  For example, if the Amount field is $1,000,000, then Amount Towards Max will be $1,750,000 (1,000,000 * 1.75).
    - If a new row is created, and "Original Pool" is checked, we will again drive off of the same system value for the current year.  Currently (in 2018) it is .75.   
    - If a Trade is created, the Amount Towards Max field will be $0.
    - If a manual row is added to the Pool section, Amount Towards Max will be equal to Amount.  So, if the Amount is $1,000,000, Amount Towards Max will be $1,000,000 as well.

3 - This new field will be editable only by BOC users (same as current pool section)
4 - If the Amount field is edited, we should recalculate the Amount Towards Max field, with the same rules as from #2.
5 - We should increase the limit of the Description field up to 200 characters, and allow more room for it on the screen.
6 - The rules that referenced the Maximum Allowable Pool value will now just take the sum of all of the *Amount Towards Max* values from the signing bonus pool section.
7 - The UI will also just take the sum of all of the *Amount Towards Max* values from the signing bonus pool section.
8 - Create a data fix to update the values for *Amount Towards Max* in the existing entries from 2017 and 2018 - so they are equivalent to what we have now in Ebis2.
9 - research when pools are created for first time

Referenced jira:  https://jira.boc.mlb.com:8443/browse/EBISII-15468

title: As a user I want the list of available system dates to be able to differ by year
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:
* For 2019 and on we only want to have 3 waiver period dates, but all 5 waiver periods should appear when viewing prior year's in the System Dates screen. 
* This change should allow us to have other system dates that only begin appearing in the year they are added, rather than existing for prior years by default. 



From nancy's JIRA - https://jira.boc.mlb.com:8443/browse/EBISII-14214

title: As a user I want the waiver bulletin process to correctly use the new waiver system dates
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:
* For 2019 and on we only want to have 3 waiver period dates, but all 5 waiver periods should appear when viewing prior year's in the System Dates screen. 
* When the Waiver Result bulletin is created, any players that have Waivers requested that do not yet have a result, and have NOT been claimed or had their waivers cancelled have their Result set according to the following criteria:
  * For UR waivers, set result text to "Secured for the purposes of UR".
  * For all other waivers, set result text to "Secured until {Waiver Claim Expiration Date}"
* Waiver Claim Expiration Date should be formatted as â€œSecured until [Sun] [Jan] [10], [13]:00 ET [2014]â€￾, except for in the case of "Midnight", which should be spelled out in place of the time (Ex: Secured until [Sun] [Jan] [10], Midnight ET [2014].)
* The Waiver Claim Expiration Date is determined by the following steps:
  * Determine the waiver period end date based on waiver type
  * Default waiver expiration date to 5pm on waiver period end
  * Handle special cases:
 - if player is optioned, update waiver expiration date to 1pm on the 3rd calendar day after the claim expiration date, unless that falls after the end of the waiver period
 - Else for outright waivers where the claim expiration date was in the 1st, outright waiver period, update waiver expiration date to 1pm on the 7th calendar day after the claim expiration date, unless that falls after the end of the waiver period.
 - Else for trade waivers, update waiver expiration date to date and time specified in system dates. 
  * For outright waivers with a claim expiration date in the 3rd outright waiver period, if the player is not Optioned, set the time in the result message to Midnight instead of whatever time was determined above
